dcterms:creator: Julia Angwin
Jeff Larson
Surya Mattu
Lauren Kirchner
dcterms:description: This dataset was collected by ProPublica as part of their analysis on recidivism decisions in the United States. It includes features such as bail applicants' age, gender, race, prior count of offenses, and degree of criminal charge, with the task of predicting which bail applicants will recidivate in the next two years.
dcterms:title: COMPAS

dcterms:creator: Ronny Kohavi
Barry Becker
dcterms:description: This dataset contains demographic, educational, and other information based on the 1994 Census database. The task is to classify whether an individual's income is over $50,000.
dcterms:title: Adult-Income

dcterms:description: This dataset contains information about individuals who took a loan from a particular bank, including demographic attributes and credit history. The task is to determine whether the person has a good or bad credit risk based on their attributes.
dcterms:title: German-Credit

dcterms:description: This dataset contains five years of data on loans given by LendingClub, an online peer-to-peer lending company. The task is to decide loan decisions based on a prediction of whether an individual will pay back their loan.
dcterms:title: Lending Club
